regen.new_specification: The scheduler shall implement time-slicing logic to manage execution time among all jobs according to the stride-scheduling algorithm.

regen.absent_element: Dynamic adjustment or adaptation within the stride scheduling algorithm based on job priority or requirements
regen.new_specification: The scheduler shall dynamically adjust its time-slicing decisions within the stride scheduling framework based on current job priorities and any specific deadlines or constraints.
The scheduler shall incorporate priority levels or utilize dynamic adjustments in conjunction with the stride-scheduling algorithm to decide time-slicing between jobs.

label: In case of a tie, the arbitrary FIFO job ordering is used.
absence: situation of multiple minimum pass values(tie)
